name: Init Device
Create Setting
Create Readings
Check Setting
Save tray config in Memory
Init flow Variables
Save Settings to File
func:
var jsonPretty = JSON.stringify(global.get('tray'),null,2);
return {topic: msg.payload, payload:jsonPretty};

name: Readings Alarm Scan
Filter MQTT
func: return {topic:msg.topic.split('/')[4], payload:msg.payload};

name: Read BlinkyBus
Publish tray
Save config file
func:
global.set('tray',JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(msg.payload)));
return {topic:'trayConfigCompleted', payload:true};

name: Continue Tray readings
func:
global.set('settingInProgress',false)
return msg;

name: Archive Pulse
Allow Readings
Set device Init flag
func:
global.set('deviceInit', 2);
return {topic: 'initDevice', payload:true};

name: Save flow env variables
func:
global.set(msg.topic,msg.payload);
return null;

name: Send Setting
Check Setting
Get Reading
Check Reading
Serial Not Connected
Reset Setting in Progress
Serial Connected
Get pm2Name
func:
msg.payload = global.get("pm2Name");
return msg;

name: Single Archive Pulse
func: return {topic:'archivePulse', payload:true};

name: Save global env variables
func:
global.set(msg.topic,msg.payload);
return null;

name: Get Signal Quality
Pause Readings
func:
global.set('settingInProgress',true)
return msg;

name: Publish tray
